textBeforeTable: -->  Long Sleeved kaftan (galabeya/jilbab) long dress Embroidery all over the dress at front and back Made from suede-like material (not leather) Extremely comfortable to wear Please check measurements at table below to make sure size is suitable for you   Actual garment measurements Measurements below are the actual garment measurements NOT body measurements. Please make sure they are suitable for you. textAfterTable: PLEASE NOTE THAT ITEM IS SHIPPED FROM EGYPT VIA INTERNATIONAL AIRMAIL SERVICE. PLEASE ALLOW 11 TO 20 BUSINESS DAYS FOR DELIVERY.  I accept Paypal payment. Payments are expected within 3 days after end of auction   Items are shipped directly from Egypt via international recorded/registered airmail. Items will be sent out within 2 business days upon receipt of payment. It usually takes 7 to 15 business days for delivery. Please note that all taxes and customs duty (if applicable) are the buyer's responsibility.     Please don't forget to leave me feedback after you get your item in a satisfactory condition. If you have any problem with the item, please let me know as soon as possible. If you don't like any of my items, you can return it within 7 days of receiving it for a refund or exchange. Please contact me as soon as possible if you intend to return an item. I'll give the refund once I get the item in same condition as you received it.
